## Generating Random Numbers
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
x <- rnorm(100,10,3)
y <- x + rnorm(100,0,1)
data.frame(x,y) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x,y)) +
  geom_point(col = "#000ff0", alpha = .5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",formula = "y ~ x",se = F, col = "#0010ff", alpha = .7)
```
